description: This series is part of the long term planktonicmonitoring of Villefranche-sur-mer,which is one of the oldestand richest in the world. It aims at describing the dynamics of the mesozooplanktoncommunity. The data collection and processing has been funded by several projects overits lifetime. It is currently supported directly by the Institut de la MerdeVillefranche (IMEV), as part of its long term monitoring effort.This dataset contains the planktonic organismscollected by a RÃ©gent net(680Î¼m mesh) and therefore coverorganisms from ~700Âµm to ~5cm.
